text: Alfie Hewett and Gordon Reid were the two-time defending champions,http://www.skysports.com/tennis/news/12040/11493780/alfie-hewett- gordon-reid-and-andy-lapthorne-win-us-open-wheelchair-titles and successfully defended their Wheelchair Men's Doubles tennis title at the 2019 US Open, defeating Gustavo Fernández and Shingo Kunieda in the final, 1–6, 6–4, [11–9]. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Bracket=== == External links == * Draw Wheelchair Men's Doubles U.S. Open, 2019 Men's Doubles
title: 2019 US Open – Wheelchair Men's Doubles
